TopicTitle: My first landing on Duna - and a surprise!

Articles.Content:
I just finished my first landing on Duna. I used my to date unused Mun Lander with a little extra fuel. Unfortunately not enough to take back off, so I have a rescue mission in the works. The awesome thing is that there was also a celestial event right when I landed. I won't spoil it, here's the pics

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Sweet! Good luck getting those guys back to Kerbin; they'll probably have an awesome story to tell the guys back at KSP.
Nice, but the cool thing is that Ike is in a geosynchronous orbit of Duna, so on that time each day, your stranded Kerbals will be treated to an awesome celestial event.
